keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels

leaflet.personalStatement: The people of Lancaster and Fleetwood have been abandoned by the political elite. It is time for a free-thinking MP who will do what is right for the area and never vote for anything which is detrimental to the future of the constituency. Fleetwood needs urgent financial assistance to rebuild and regenerate the town. Lancaster is the jewel of the north, yet it is ignored by political parties and politicians whose only interest is filling their own pockets.

quotes.text: Sentences for crime against people and property should mean what they say. Life imprisonment must mean life. Too often crimes are committed by those on early release schemes. The priority should be to protect society and to refresh this is guarded by a liberal justice system.
I will be a constant available to the people of this area so that they have a channel through which to voice their concerns. Does anyone actually know who our MP is? I doubt it.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Please place this leaflet in your window.
